page.title: 04SPEKE INDUSTRIAL ESTATE.....
page.content: When Speke housing estate was built in the 1930's, an industrial estate was built next to it, to give jobs to its people. Today some of the factories have closed down but we still have Fords-cars, Glaxo-drugs, Bryant & May- matches and Dunlops-rubber amongst others.Soon Speke Enterprise Zone will open, hopefully bringing more jobs and factories. Dunlops Factory... ..This is one of the oldest in the area. The factory once made aeroplanes but was bought by Dunlops in 1948.They make rubber goods such as golfballs, sports shoes, tyres for cars, buses, tractors and aeroplanes. Today the Speke Factory makes rubber belting which is used in escalators and conveyor belts. Written by Lynsie Coyne St.Christophers School.
